metadata.impact: You require TLS to be configured on apiserver as well as kubelets.
metadata.default_value: By default, kubelet connections are over https.
metadata.name: Ensure that the --kubelet-https argument is set to true
metadata.rationale:
Connections from apiserver to kubelets could potentially carry sensitive data such as secrets and keys.
It is thus important to use in-transit encryption for any communication between the apiserver and kubelets.
metadata.audit:
Run the following command on the Control Plane node:

```
ps -ef | grep kube-apiserver
```

Verify that the `--kubelet-https` argument either does not exist or is set to `true`.
metadata.remediation: Edit the API server pod specification file `/etc/kubernetes/manifests/kube-apiserver.yaml` on the Control Plane node and remove the `--kubelet-https` parameter.
